New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Sachin Tendulkar's record with his 49th ODI century.
Ravindra Jadeja achieved career-best bowling figures of 5 for 33.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 101 runs.
Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs.
South Africa were bowled out for 83.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on Virat Kohli's 35th birthday.
A crowd of 60,000 at Eden Gardens celebrated Kohli's century.
